page.title: 01WOOD LANE SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: Wood Lane Sports Centre is situated opposite Central Park, Dagenham,which is near Dagenham Civic Centre.Inside the sports complex there are a great deal of facilities.There are four squash courts,two astroturf five-a-side pitches,badminton courts, a multi-purpose hall,synthetic skating hall,basketball courts,a gymnasium,a weight training room,a karate,aikido and judo room,cricket nets,boxing facilities,a sauna,a solarium and a rifle range.There are also drinks dispensers,a large bar and toilet facilities including those for the handicapped.The new section of the building was opened on September 22nd. 1984.
